13 #include <exception>

15 namespace discpp {
16  namespace exceptions {
17  class DiscordObjectNotFound : public std::runtime_error {
18  public:
19  explicit DiscordObjectNotFound(rapidjson::Document &json) : std::runtime_error(
20  std::to_string(json["code"].GetInt()) + ": " + json["message"].GetString()) {}
21 
22  explicit DiscordObjectNotFound(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
23  };
24 
25  class MaximumLimitException : public std::runtime_error {
26  public:
27  explicit MaximumLimitException(rapidjson::Document &json) : std::runtime_error(
28  std::to_string(json["code"].GetInt()) + ": " + json["message"].GetString()) {}
29 
30  explicit MaximumLimitException(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
31  };
32 
33  class ProhibitedEndpointException : public std::runtime_error {
34  public:
35  explicit ProhibitedEndpointException(const std::string &msg) : std::runtime_error(msg) {}
36  };
37 
38  class AuthenticationException : public std::runtime_error {
39  public:
40  AuthenticationException() : std::runtime_error("Invalid token, failed to connect to gateway") {}
41 
42  explicit AuthenticationException(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
43  };
44 
45  class RequestTooLargeException : public std::runtime_error {
46  public:
47  explicit RequestTooLargeException(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
48  };
49

51  public:
52  explicit FeatureDisabledException(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
53  };
54 
55  class BannedException : public std::runtime_error {
56  public:
57  explicit BannedException(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
58  };

61  public:
62  explicit MissingAccessException(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
63  };

66  public:
67  explicit InvalidAccountTypeException(const std::string &str) : std::runtime_error(str) {}
68  };

71  public:

76  public:

88  };

91  public:

95  namespace http {
96  class HTTPResponseException : public std::runtime_error {
97  public:
98  explicit HTTPResponseException(const std::int32_t &response_code, const std::string &str) :
99  std::runtime_error(str), response_code(response_code) {}
100 
101  std::int32_t response_code;
102  };
103  }
104  }
105 
106  inline void ThrowException(rapidjson::Document& json) {
107  switch (json["code"].GetInt()) {
108  case 10001:
109  case 10002:
110  case 10003:
111  case 10004:
112  case 10005:
113  case 10006:
114  case 10007:
115  case 10008:
116  case 10009:
117  case 10010:
118  case 10011:
119  case 10012:
120  case 10013:
121  case 10014:
122  case 10015:
123  case 10026:
124  case 10027:
125  case 10028:
126  case 10029:
127  case 10030:
128  case 10031:
129  case 10032:
130  case 10036:
131  throw exceptions::DiscordObjectNotFound(json["message"].GetString());
132  case 20001:
133  case 20002:
134  case 500003: // Cannot execute action on a DM channel.
135  throw exceptions::ProhibitedEndpointException(json["message"].GetString());
136  case 30001:
137  case 30002:
138  case 30003:
139  case 30005:
140  case 30007:
141  case 30010:
142  case 30013:
143  case 30015:
144  case 30016:
145  throw exceptions::MaximumLimitException(json["message"].GetString());
146  case 400001:
147  case 400002:
148  throw exceptions::AuthenticationException(json["message"].GetString());
149  case 400005:
150  throw exceptions::RequestTooLargeException(json["message"].GetString());
151  case 400006:
152  throw exceptions::FeatureDisabledException(json["message"].GetString());
153  case 400007:
154  throw exceptions::BannedException(json["message"].GetString());
155  case 50001:
156  throw exceptions::MissingAccessException(json["message"].GetString());
157  case 50003:
158  throw exceptions::InvalidAccountTypeException(json["message"].GetString());
159  case 50004:
160  throw exceptions::GuildWidgetDisabledException(json["message"].GetString());
161  case 50005:
162  case 50006:
163  case 50007:
164  case 50008:
165  case 50009:
166  throw exceptions::MissingAccessException(json["message"].GetString());
167  case 50010:
168  case 50011:
169  case 50012:
170  case 50025:
171  throw exceptions::OAuth2Exception(json["message"].GetString());
172  case 50013:
173  throw NoPermissionException(json["message"].GetString());
174  case 50014:
175  throw exceptions::AuthenticationException(json["message"].GetString());
176  case 50015:
177  case 50016:
178  case 50019:
179  case 50020:
180  case 50021:
181  case 50034:
182  case 50035:
183  case 50036:
184  case 90001:
185  throw exceptions::EndpointParameterException(json["message"].GetString());
186  case 50041:
187  throw exceptions::InvalidAPIVersionException(json["message"].GetString());
188  case 130000:
189  throw exceptions::APIOverloadedException(json["message"].GetString());
190  }
191 
192  throw std::runtime_error(std::to_string(json["code"].GetInt()) + ": " + json["message"].GetString());
193  }
194 }
195
